creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: River scene; view from the middle of the water; in the          distance a grey-blue double arched bridge crosses the river     with faint images of a city behind; dense gropus opf trees      tower over the river at each side in the foreground.
dimension: H.21-7/8 x W.29-3/8 x D.1 in. (canvas)
title: View on the Loire
